special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
Choose one that hasn’t been chosen –
• Draw three cards.
• Exile up to one target creature and all creature tokens you don’t control.
• Put a creature card you own from your graveyard or from exile onto the battlefield under your control.
Exile Crossing the Rubicon, your hand, your graveyard, and your library.
